mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP_BOARDS(ID, TITLE, CONTENT, EMPID, CREATEDATE) VALUES(EMP_BOARDS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{empId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT , EMPID, CREATEDATE , VIEW_CNT as viewCnt, "LIKE" FROM EMP_BOARDS WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, EMPID, BID , ISVIEW AS "view" , LATEST_DATE1 AS latestView , ISLIKE AS "like" , LATEST_DATE2 AS latestLike FROM EMP_BOARDS_STATISTICS WHERE EMPID = #{empId} AND BID = #{bId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP_BOARDS_STATISTICS VALUES(EMP_BOARDS_STATISTICS_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{empId}, #{bId}, 'Y', SYSDATE, 'N', NULL)
